anomalyMod:AuditingHijack.NAME: Auditing Hijack
DESCRIPTIONS: : If you choose only #b1 card, put it back into your hand and reduce its #yImprobability by #b

anomalyMod:ControlHijack.NAME: Control Hijack
DESCRIPTIONS: NL NL Has a little note.
: If you choose only #b1 card, reduce its #yImprobability by #b
this combat instead. If you choose at least #b2 cards, draw #b1 card.
"The order of how you select cards with the #yPortable #yTerminal matters! Last selected card goes to the bottom of the draw pile." NL -Deimos

anomalyMod:DeimosCap.NAME: Deimos's Cap
anomalyMod:DeimosCap.FLAVOR: All that's left of him. He must be hurtling through some purgatory hell.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yImprobability now always equals twice your floor number. If you would gain #yImprobability in combat, take damage equal to #b

anomalyMod:DummyFile.NAME: Dummy File
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card you play each turn adds a #yDummy of the same card type into your hand.

anomalyMod:GreenRock.NAME: Green Rock
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain #yImprobability, gain #yBlock equal to #b

anomalyMod:Megachette.NAME: Megachette
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time each #yAttack deals at least #b
unblocked attack damage to each enemy, apply #b

anomalyMod:MowsetrapCar.NAME: Mowsetrap Car
anomalyMod:MowsetrapCar.FLAVOR: A little wind-up car powered by a mowsetrap. Must be someone's project.

anomalyMod:MilkTea.NAME: Milk Tea
anomalyMod:MilkTea.FLAVOR: Coffee milk tea, 70% sugar and 30% ice.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you gain #yImprobability each turn, gain [E] .

anomalyMod:Nightshirt.NAME: Nightshirt
anomalyMod:Nightshirt.FLAVOR: Time to never wear anything else for a whole two months.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, #yRetain all cards with #yImprobability.

anomalyMod:PotOfPetunias.NAME: Pot of Petunias
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a copy of the last card played into your hand. It costs 0 this combat and #yExhausts.

anomalyMod:Ratchet.NAME: Ratchet
anomalyMod:Ratchet.FLAVOR: It only turns clockwise. Let's dial this up to 11.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] [E] at the start of your turn. Every #b

anomalyMod:WheeRemote.NAME: Whee Remote
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, reverse your draw pile.
